steps_string:
Steps( Begin(), 
Change_Box_Number(the_instruction_box(step_number(9), 2), increase(2)),
Change_Box_Number(the_instruction_box(step_number(4), 2), increase(1)),
Verify(greater_than(instruction_box_number(step_number(6), 2), number_in_box(7)), then_go_to_step(6), then_go_to_step(1)),
Operation(Multiply(), number_in_box(8), number_in_box(1), put_result_into_box(6)),
Verify(greater_than(instruction_box_number(step_number(9), 2), number_in_box(6)), then_go_to_step(8), then_go_to_step(2)),
Put(number_in_box(8), into_box(6)),
Verify(greater_than(instruction_box_number(step_number(9), 1), number_in_box(6)), then_go_to_step(5), then_go_to_step(4)),
Change_Box_Number(the_instruction_box(step_number(4), 1), increase(1)),
Put(number_in_box(4), into_box(5)), End())
question: What number is now in Box 6?
question_zh: 经过以上操作之后，现在6号盒子中的数字是多少?
desc: Change Instruction 9: Increase the second box number mentioned in it by 2
Change Instruction 4: Increase the second box number mentioned in it by 1
Is the second box number mentioned in Instruction 6 greater than ( number in box 7 )
Multiply: ( number in box 8 ) * ( number in box 1 ), put result into box 6.
Is the second box number mentioned in Instruction 9 greater than ( number in box 6 )
Put ( number in box 8 ) into box 6
Is the first box number mentioned in Instruction 9 greater than ( number in box 6 )
Change Instruction 4: Increase the first box number mentioned in it by 1
Put ( number in box 4 ) into box 5
desc_zh: 更改指令9：将该指令中的第2个盒子的编号加2
更改指令4：将该指令中的第2个盒子的编号加1
判断：指令6中第2个盒子的编号比7号盒子中的数字大吗
相乘：8号盒子中的数字*1号盒子中的数字，将结果放在6号盒子中。
判断：指令9中第2个盒子的编号比6号盒子中的数字大吗
将8号盒子中的数字放在6号盒子中
判断：指令9中第1个盒子的编号比6号盒子中的数字大吗
更改指令4：将该指令中的第1个盒子的编号加1
将4号盒子中的数字放在5号盒子中
